code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import data from"../../epicure.json";export var chefsSlice=createSlice({name:"chefs",initialState:{value:data.chefs},reducers:{chefsPageFilter:function chefsPageFilter(state,action){var chefFilterType=action.payload;switch(chefFilterType){case"all":state.value=data.chefs;break;case"new":state.value=data.chefs;state.value=state.value.filter(function(chef){return chef.isNew===true;});break;case"mostViewed":state.value=data.chefs;state.value=state.value.filter(function(chef){return chef.mostViewed===true;});break;default:state.value=state.value;}}}});var chefsPageFilter=chefsSlice.actions.chefsPageFilter;export{chefsPageFilter};export default chefsSlice.reducer;
